definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive

sentences.english: Mr. Gilbert's heir inherited the house and a large sum of money.
sentences.chinese: 吉伯特先生的繼承人繼承了房子和一大筆錢。

sentences.english: He was motivated by the hope of fathering a male heir to the Tudor Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 他這樣做是爲了都鐸王朝能有一名男性繼承人。

sentences.english: The robber abduct the heiress and hold her to ransom.
sentences.chinese: 強盜劫持了女繼承人並向她索取贖金。

sentences.english: In a car accident, he saved his estate company heir Jiang village.
sentences.chinese: 在一場車禍中，他救下了江氏地產公司繼承人江村。

sentences.english: Tracy: She's an heiress to the Johnson & Johnson fortune.
sentences.chinese: 她是強生公司的女繼承人。

sentences.english: This agreement is eligible for the successors or concessionaires of any parties.
sentences.chinese: 本協議對每一方的繼承人和受讓人均有約束力。

sentences.english: The money that Mrs. Flower had should be passed to the right person.
sentences.chinese: 弗勞爾夫人的錢應該交給合法繼承人。

sentences.english: She's an heiress to the Johnson & Johnson fortune.
sentences.chinese: 她是強生公司的女繼承人。

sentences.english: He was a successful businessman and future inheritor to the family firm's substantial wealth.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位令人羨慕的富商和家族企業的繼承人。

sentences.english: He claimed that he was the only rightful heir.
sentences.chinese: 他聲稱自己是唯一合法的繼承人。

sentences.english: An heiress, she doesn’t know what to be when she grows up, either.
sentences.chinese: 作爲家族繼承人，在長大之後她也不知道該做什麼。
只有兒子才能成爲繼承人。

sentences.english: Develop a well inherit a person to compare what all mighty.
sentences.chinese: 培養一個好的繼承人比什麼都強。

sentences.english: There is too much onion in the salad.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥頭甚至可以使遺產繼承人或寡婦也哭起來。

sentences.english: The Buddha's heir, aware and mindful.
sentences.chinese: 以正念明覺，爲佛陀的法的繼承人。

sentences.english: I think your choice of a successor savors of favoritism.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲你對繼承人的選擇有偏袒之嫌。

definition: to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son)/to inherit
to fight over/to contest/to vie over
to wield (political etc) power/be in power
